item.title: Data Curation Workshop for Park Managers
item.description: In August 2022, I co-organized a week-long workshop for Madagascar National Parks to develop data management, analysis, and visualization skills, pertaining to the database of vertebrate observations for the 43 terrestrial protected areas across Madagascar.
